description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. A board game for two players inspired by classic Go. Spread your influence as much as you can, while diminishing that of your opponent. Play against a friend, or one of 3 computer opponents.
description.short: A board game for two players inspired by classic Go. Spread your influence as much as you can, while diminishing that of your opponent. Play against a friend, or one of 3 computer opponents.
